Bio: Dan Wilde is a singer-songwriter from Blackpool, England, though he now resides in Cambridge. He has recently released his debut album 'This Is The Place' following on from the success of his previous release 'Live at the Voodoo Rooms'. In 2010 Dan landed a support slot with Irish singer-songwriter Mark Geary on a short tour of the Czech Republic. He later set out on a month long tour of the East Coast of America. Having just released an album through Littlest Mojo Recordings and currently working on new material, 2011 promises to be a big year for the young troubadour.
